message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I believe the product has a fair value of around $10,000 for me. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to that amount?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $16,000.  This is a very fair offer considering the benefits you'll gain.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I seek, I propose a price of $12,500. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
